pkgmetadata.longdescription: # flogging[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/flogging/badge/?version=latest)](https://flogging.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)[![Code coverage](https://codecov.io/github/fragiletech/flogging/coverage.svg)](https://codecov.io/github/fragiletech/flogging)[![PyPI package](https://badgen.net/pypi/v/flogging)](https://pypi.org/project/flogging/)[![Code style: black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/ambv/black)[![license: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-green.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)`flogging` offers nice logging formatting and structured logging.
